paragraphs.name: ecab
paragraphs.text: Side-note: Well what about Medium? The more I use Medium, the more I don’t think it counts as a social network. Why? Because in my last two articles, none of the comments were negative or confrontational. Zero. There were several people who wanted to have constructive debates, which is always warmly welcomed! This type of civility isn’t a characteristic of previous social networks and platforms.
There are even studies that suggest you don’t have to be too picky about the music you select, so long as it’s symphonies.
paragraphs.name: 6a00

paragraphs.text: Loved this article, thank you. After a post-election mental break-down where I was stuck to social media like gum to a shoe, I turned completely off, turned off news, meditated, moved and listened to music.
